title: CHRONOSHOT
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Advanced tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Advanced tinkering required**. Follow extra steps [here](https://wiki.junkstore.xyz/wiki/Help:Epic_Games/Working/Chronoshot)
description: CHRONOSHOT is a free-to-play score-driven sci-fi arena shooting game, with specialized time mechanics. The player is equipped with a Jetpack, several weapons, and special ammunition which can be used to turn the tide against the enemy and dominate the leader board!
